item.description:
Ottawa International Animation Festival

Boston Premiere

Introduction and Q&A with Chris Robinson, OIAF artistic director and author, on Saturday, January 10 at 4pm.

The Ottawa International Animation Festival (OIAF), the largest event of its kind in North America, attracts animators and attendees from around the world. See a selection of the best films from OIAF 2008. Boston film buffs, art lovers, and cartoon fans won't want to miss this great lineup.

Since this is the first time this has come to Boston, I suggest buying tickets on line ahead of time. Go to the site for the ICA: www.icaboston.org/programs/film

There aren't many choices near the ICA so afterwards we can walk to a restaurant in Chinatown.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be holding our meetup sign down in front at the end of the films
item.name: Ottawa International Animation Festival
